DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety Prasaprohyai 95 % ethanolic extract dose 100 mg 200 mg 6 week . ( Clinical Trial phase I )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Prasaprohyai 95 % Ethanolic Extract Capsules Healthy Volunteer
DOC.detailed_description: Sample size Group 1 ( 100mg/meal ) = 6 female , 6 male Group 2 ( 200mg/meal ) = 6 female , 6 male Volunteers divide 2 group . One take Prasaprohyai 95 % ethanolic extract capsule dose 100 mg three time day meal take Prasaprohyai 95 % ethanolic extract capsule dose 200 mg 3 time day meal six week . After , cease use drug 2 week ( wash period ) . All volunteer follow third week , sixth week eighth week evaluate safety medicine . The researcher record data age , career , BMI , vital sign , sign symptom . Safety monitor hematology test liver function test , renal function test , lipid profile blood sugar . The first step research study group 1 ( 100 mg ) . If prof safe , group 2 ( 200 mg ) study . The data gather evaluated use statistical software . The result form mean Â± standard deviation . The study plan repeat measure ANOVA Friedman 's test order evaluate difference group , accompany use paired t-test Wilcoxon 's test order evaluate difference within group . A significance level p < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Age range 2060 year old . 2 ) Healthy , n't serious medical condition congestive heart disease , liver renal dysfunction , uncontrolled hypertension , severe asthma , tuberculosis , HIV previous month recruit study , use history take complete physical examination laboratory result . 3 ) Do take medicine constantly . 4 ) Female pregnant lactating ( non menopause woman pregnancy test . Time since first day last menstruation 2835 day ) . 5 ) Participant agreement follow instruction 8 week . 6 ) Not participant another study . 1 ) Allergic reaction Prasaprohyai medication .
